name: Against Odds
description:
Background:

You are a warrior and one of the last Diceians left alive. One day you awaken only to find yourself falling into a die surrounded by foes and obstacles alike. Now, your only option left is to fight, survive and speed through this perilous situation as the enemies relentlessly come to take your dicey life in order to wipe out your race. What's worse is that you are forced to adjust to your environment because, just like any dice, this dice world needs to be rolled. Should you fail to roll the dice in time, you will only feel the wrath and judgment of the die. With that said, are you ready to go against the odds?

==================================================

Controls:

Left Click - Swipe Attack

Right Click - Roll Dice

Space - Dash

ESC - Leave Game

GMTK Game Jam 2022 Submission
